name: pitpass-generator
description: A simple test application for creating a generic pit pass which can be used for something like Pinewood Derby.
author: Brandon Lind <linddeveloper@gmail.com>

scripts.postinstall: (cd ./client && npm i && npm run build --aot -prod) && rm -rf ./server/public/dist && mkdir -p ./server/public/dist && cp ./client/dist/* ./server/public/dist
